# Yggdrasil (YGG) Games Integration

This module encapsulates the Yggdrasil games integration.

## Setup Details

### Basic Configuration

| Setting              | Description                                                         |
| -------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| toporg               | rawentertainment                                                    |
| org                  | roobet                                                              |
| endpoint             | https://api.777.dev/                                                |
| Backoffice Prod      | https://bo-prod-cw.yggdrasilgaming.com/backoffice/login.xhtml       |
| Backoffice Stage     | https://bo-stage-cw.yggdrasilgaming.com/backoffice/login.xhtml      |
| Launch Stage CW      | https://staticstagingcw.yggdrasilgaming.com/init/launchClient.html? |
| Launch PFF CW        | https://staticpffcw.yggdrasilgaming.com/init/launchClient.html?     |
| Launch Production CW | https://staticlivecw.yggdrasilgaming.com/init/launchClient.html?    |

### Backend (for prepaids if API will be used)

| Setting       | Description                                                |
| ------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| Stage CW      | https://stagingcw.yggdrasilgaming.com/game.web/service?    |
| Production CW | https://productioncw.yggdrasilgaming.com/game.web/service? |
